original_title: Blues Company: Keepin' the Blues Alive
overview: Foreign / Music/Musical - The Blues Company is an innovative band that breathes fresh life into the blues. When Germany's oldest and most successful blues band is on the stage, knocking out masterpieces of Chicago blues, soul, boogie, rock and New Orleans sound, no-one in the audience can fail to be moved.
title: Blues Company: Keepin' the Blues Alive
